headline: Synopsys Stock Rises. Why This Analyst Sees a Buying Opportunity After Wednesday’s Pummeling.
summary: Shares of  Synopsys  suffered their worst same-day percent decrease on record Wednesday.  Mizuho  analysts described the double-digit percent decline in the stock relative to a flat  as “an overreaction and a buying opportunity,” after the electronic design automation company’s fiscal third-quarter earnings revealed weakness in its intellectual property business.  Shares ended the session down 36% on Wednesday, marking the largest same-day percentage decrease since  Synopsys  began trading in February 1992.

headline: How Cadence's (CDNS) Expanded Digital Twin Platform With NVIDIA Could Shape AI Infrastructure Development
summary: On September 9, 2025, Cadence Design Systems announced the expansion of its Cadence Reality Digital Twin Platform library to include a digital twin of the NVIDIA DGX SuperPOD with DGX GB200 systems, showcased at the AI Infra Summit in Santa Clara, California. This collaboration with NVIDIA enhances digital modeling capabilities for AI-driven data center design, offering customers a more accurate and comprehensive platform that reflects current and future demands for large-scale AI...
